description: Multi-objective optimization problems requiring system-level thinking

problems.prompt: Design a forward converter for VASIMR plasma rocket engine power processing unit. Input: 300V DC from solar array, Output: 200V at 50A for RF plasma heating. Must survive 5000+ hour mission duration, handle solar array power variations, and operate in deep space thermal environment.

Design a SEPIC converter for volcano monitoring station. Input: 6V-14V from solar/battery hybrid, Output: 5V at 1A for data acquisition and telemetry. Must survive SO2 corrosive atmosphere, 200°C ground contact heat, and operate unattended for 2 years.

Design a half-bridge converter for container ship cold ironing system. Input: 6.6kV shore power (rectified), Output: 440V at 500A for ship electrical. Must meet maritime safety standards, handle ship-to-shore connection dynamics, and operate with salt spray exposure.

Design a buck converter for transmission electron microscope electromagnetic lens. Input: 48V, Output: 3V at 50A for lens coil. Must achieve 1ppm current stability, <10nV/√Hz noise, and thermal drift <0.1ppm/°C for atomic resolution imaging.

Design a flyback converter for oil platform lightning warning system. Input: 24V from platform UPS, Output: 12V at 2A for electric field mill sensors. Must survive direct lightning attachment (200kA), operate in Zone 2 hazardous area, and provide continuous monitoring.

Design a full-bridge converter for HTS superconducting power cable cryocooler. Input: 480V AC rectified (680V DC), Output: 300V at 30A for Stirling cryocooler compressor. Must maintain 77K cooling with 99.99% uptime, handle liquid nitrogen backup transition, and provide soft-start for compressor.

Design a boost converter for tidal stream turbine generator interface. Input: 200V-600V variable from PMSG, Output: 750V DC bus at 50kW. Must handle bidirectional flow (tidal reversal), survive biofouling, and operate submerged at 50m for 5-year maintenance intervals.

Design a Ćuk converter for photomultiplier tube (PMT) bias in neutrino detector. Input: 5V from DAQ system, Output: -1000V at 1mA per PMT (1000 channels). Must achieve <1mV ripple for single-photon counting, survive 20-year underground operation, and provide per-channel adjustment.

Design a forward converter for radio telescope cryogenic low-noise amplifier. Input: 28V from receiver, Output: 1.5V at 100mA (InP HEMT bias). Must achieve <1μV RMS noise, operate at 20K cryogenic temperature, and provide magnetic-field-free operation for polarimetry.

Design a SEPIC converter for underground mining inspection robot. Input: 18V-32V from lithium battery pack, Output: 24V at 10A for motor drivers and sensors. Must operate in explosive dust atmosphere (ATEX), survive 50g shock from rock falls, and provide 8-hour autonomous operation.
